entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'billingMethod_display' is added to the 'OrderProduct' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'billingMethod'
arguments.name: billingMethod_display

members.name: billingMethod

constantValues: Billing method for the project contract line. Valid values are Time and Material and Fixed Price

members.description: Billing method for the project contract line. Valid values are Time and Material and Fixed Price

members.name: billingStartDate

constantValues: Select the billing start date for the project contract line.

members.description: Select the billing start date for the project contract line.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'billingStatus_display' is added to the 'OrderProduct' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'billingStatus'
arguments.name: billingStatus_display

members.name: billingStatus

constantValues: Select the billing status for the project contract line.

members.description: Select the billing status for the project contract line.

members.name: budgetAmount

constantValues: Enter the amount the customer has set aside or is willing to pay for the project contract component.

members.description: Enter the amount the customer has set aside or is willing to pay for the project contract component.

members.name: budgetAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Budget Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Budget Amount in base currency.

members.name: costAmount

constantValues: Shows the total cost price of the product based on the cost price per unit and quantity.

members.description: Shows the total cost price of the product based on the cost price per unit and quantity.

members.name: costAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Cost Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Cost Amount in base currency.

members.name: costPricePerUnit

constantValues: Cost per unit of the product. The default is the cost price of the product.

members.description: Cost per unit of the product. The default is the cost price of the product.

members.name: costPricePerUnitBase

constantValues: Value of the Cost Price Per Unit in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Cost Price Per Unit in base currency.

members.name: includeExpense

constantValues: Select whether to include expenses in the project contract line.

members.description: Select whether to include expenses in the project contract line.

members.name: includeFee

constantValues: Select whether to include fees in the project contract line.

members.description: Select whether to include fees in the project contract line.

members.name: includeMaterial

constantValues: Select whether to include materials in the project contract line.

members.description: Select whether to include materials in the project contract line.

members.name: includeTime

constantValues: Select whether to include time transactions in the project contract line.

members.description: Select whether to include time transactions in the project contract line.

value.name: invoiceFrequency

constantValues: Select the frequency for the automatic invoice creation job to create the invoice.

value.description: Select the frequency for the automatic invoice creation job to create the invoice.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'lineType_display' is added to the 'OrderProduct' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'lineType'
arguments.name: lineType_display

members.name: lineType

constantValues: The field to distinguish the order lines to be of project service or field service

members.description: The field to distinguish the order lines to be of project service or field service

value.name: project

constantValues: Select the project of the project contract line.

value.description: Select the project of the project contract line.

members.name: quoteLine

constantValues: (Deprecated) Shows the quote line related to the project contract line.

members.description: (Deprecated) Shows the quote line related to the project contract line.
